text: Christian Marquise Wood (born September 27, 1995) is an American professional basketball player for the Detroit Pistons of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He played college basketball for the UNLV Runnin' Rebels. He has also played professionally for the Philadelphia 76ers, Charlotte Hornets, and the Milwaukee Bucks in the National Basketball Association (NBA). On March 14, 2020, Wood tested positive for the coronavirus during the pandemic and the suspension of the season. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Detroit Pistons players Category:Milwaukee Bucks players Category:Philadelphia 76ers players Category:New Orleans Pelicans players Category:Sportspeople from Long Beach, California
title: Christian Wood
